reporting_cycle: Secretary-General reports no later than 1 August 2008
summary:
13. Takes note of the Timor-Leste National Recovery Strategy and calls upon UNMIT to cooperate with UN agencies to support the Government.

14. Requests UNMIT to consider gender issues and protect women and girls from violence.

15. Requests the Secretary-General to ensure compliance with the UN's zero-tolerance policy on sexual exploitation and abuse.

16. Requests regular reports from the Secretary-General on developments, implementation of this resolution, and a medium-term strategy with benchmarks.

17. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
